name: Monitoring: The observer
description:
WARNING

This game contains flashing  flashing lights, loud noises and jumpscares.

By the way, this game is very difficult.

It is an arcade game with horror elements, your task is to document strange events with a screenshot from the security camera perspective.

Someone (or something) will make this task difficult for you and it will not be as easy as it may seem. During the game, unexpected sequences can occur in which you will have to make decisions, it depends on these decisions whether you die or survive.

The game will have 3 levels of difficulty, each of which will differ in many things and mechanics. Advanced AI system allows you to be unpredictable even for advanced players, which makes the game with each subsequent night and with each new approach even more interesting.

First steps

At the very beginning of the adventure, familiarize yourself with the controls, you will find the list in the menu if you click the tutorial button.

Mechanics

The main goal of the game is to survive until 3:15 a.m. each night and collect as many photos of the intruder as possible. But this will be hampered by frequent power failures caused by the use of the monitoring system

Loud noises annoy the enemy, and they also reveal your position. Save electricity because power failures make a very loud noise!

However, when you are sure of an attack, hide under the desk, but if you do it for no reason, you will only annoy the intruder, not giving him an opportunity to attack and he will find a way to kill you.
